Articles.Content:
What is the current velocity limit for collisions (controlled or otherwise) between terrain and the mk1 capsule?

How does the velocity limit vary with increasing 'collision resistance' in the parts files?

I piloted my craft (just a capsule and a parachute) into a descent. Final descent rate was between 10 and 11 m/s.. into a mountain side on the dark side of the planet. The whole craft blew up.

As of version 0.9 is the night side still made of anti-matter, or am I just going too damn fast? The red light next to the vertical velocity indicator was off, usually that implies 'safe' landing speed, right?
Night side is still instant death. It will continue to be this way until the new terrain engine is implemented.
